MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH44 postcode area of Innerleithen. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5:00pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Caerlee House substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:19pm on Monday, 11th January 2021.
